summary: FC Barcelona, or Barça, is a famous soccer team from Spain. Founded in 1899, it's more than just a club—it's a symbol of Catalan culture. The fans own the club, and it's one of the richest and most valuable teams globally. They play in blue and garnet stripes and have won many trophies, including five UEFA Champions League titles. Barcelona has a big rivalry with Real Madrid, and their games are called El Clásico. Some of the world's best players, like Lionel Messi, have played for the team.
title: FC Barcelona
